document.full_text: militiamen loyal to former ivory coast president laurent gbagbo killed 120 people during a "scorched earth" retreat from abidjan last week, the defense ministry said.
document.title: fleeing pro-gbagbo militias killed 120: ivorian government
lines_and_colors: militiamen loyal to former ivory coast president laurent gbagbo killed 120 people during a "scorched earth" retreat from abidjan last week, the defense ministry said.
